sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Will set the ACLs for roadmap.*timeline_admin to false. timeline_admin will have write access to roadmap_page with a table level ACL</description>
        <name>RoadmapPageWriteACLFix</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');
gr.addQuery('name', 'roadmap_page.*');
gr.addQuery('operation', 'write');
gr.addQuery('type', 'record');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.setValue('active', false);
gr.setWorkflow(false);
gr.updateMultiple();
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-03-18 14:52:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3a75132093521200fc0072edb67ffb95</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RoadmapPageWriteACLFix</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Timeline Visualization" source="com.snc.timeline_visualization">e7ff8ee747e64210cd4e1ce4316d438c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3a75132093521200fc0072edb67ffb95</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-03-18 14:52:54</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
